name: Initial action on the record
text: [§124A-92]  Initial action on the record.  After a trial by court-martial the record shall be forwarded to the convening authority, as reviewing authority, and action thereon may be taken by the person who convened the court, a commissioned officer commanding for the time being, a successor in command, or by the governor. [L 1982, c 171, pt of §2]
